welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rosh Ha'Ayin, a charming city known for its rich history and cultural significance. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer, and we hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Ben Gurion International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ben Gurion International Airport, used for both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sde Dov Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Sde Dov Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.
